Articles.Content: Perhaps add a feature in the Astronaut Facility where if you click on a veteran Kerbal, you'll get a summary of the missions they've been on, which would include mission names, total flights, time in space, total EVAs, surfaces visited and milestones (ie first Kerbal on the Mun, longest EVA, closest to the sun, etc).
Is there a mod out there that does this? I've been looking, but haven't found one.
Great idea. I'd love to have mission records (names, notes, events, etc), too.
Great idea. I was also thinking of a type of mission summary that could be done at the end of a mission as an easy-to-understand report, instead of the messy science summary.
